IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: THE COLLEGE'S MISSION IS TO EQUIP STUDENTS TO FLOURISH BY PROVIDING AN EXCELLENT LIBERAL ARTS EDUCATION IN A CHRIST-CENTERED ENVIRONMENT WHERE LEARNING AND BIBLICAL TRUTH ARE INTEGRATED TO DEVELOP THE WHOLE PERSON. ERSKINE THEOLOGICAL SEMINARY IS AN EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION OF THE ASSOCIATE REFORMED PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH, AND THE SEMINARY HAS BEEN CALLED BY GOD AND COMMISSIONED BY ITS HOST TO SERVE NOT ONLY THAT DENOMINATION, BUT ALSO THE ENTIRE CHURCH OF JESUS CHRIST. THE MISSION OF ERSKINE THEOLOGICAL SEMINARY IS TO EDUCATE PERSONS FOR SERVICE IN THE CHRISTIAN CHURCH.
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE COLLEGE'S MISSION IS TO EQUIP STUDENTS TO FLOURISH BY PROVIDING AN EXCELLENT LIBERAL ARTS EDUCATION IN A CHRIST-CENTERED ENVIRONMENT WHERE LEARNING AND BIBLICAL TRUTH ARE INTEGRATED TO DEVELOP THE WHOLE PERSON. THE SEMINARY'S MISSION IS TO EDUCATE PERSONS FOR SERVICE IN THE CHRISTIAN CHURCH.
IRS990.Description: COLLEGE AND SEMINARY EDUCATION,STUDENT ROOM AND BOARD, ATHLETICS, BOOKSTORE, AND OTHER COLLEGE ACTIVITIES

Form990PartVIISectionA.NamePerson: THE REV DR JR DE WITT
Form990PartVIISectionA.Title: TRUSTEE

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of How Organization Reports Conservation Easements:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE COLLEGE HAS FIVE BUILDINGS ON CAMPUS THAT ARE LISTED ON THE NATIONAL HISTORIC REGISTER.
THE INSTITUTION HAS AN ART MUSEUM ON CAMPUS WHERE MOST COLLECTIONS ARE PLACED ON EXHIBIT. CERTAIN COLLECTIONS MAY BE MAINTAINED IN THE INSITUTION'S ARCHIVES.

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: THE INSTITUTION'S RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY IS MADE AVAILABLE THROUGH LOCAL PRINT MEDIA OUTLETS, COLLEGE AND SEMINARY ADMISSIONS PUBLICATIONS, AND COLLEGE AND SEMINARY CATALOGUES.
IRS990ScheduleE.GovtFinancialAidExplanation: THE COLLEGE RECEIVES FINANCIAL AID FROM A GOVERNMENTAL AGENCY TO HELP STUDENTS OBTAIN AN EDUCATION.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: DISCRETIONARY SPENDING ACCOUNTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PRESIDENT AND CERTAIN VICE PRESIDENTS. ALL EXPENDITURES FROM DISCRETIONARY SPENDING ACCOUNTS REQUIRE APPROPRIATE DOCUMENTATION AND SIGNATURE APPROVALS PRIOR TO THE EXPENDITURE BEING PROCESSED. COLLEGE HOUSING IS PROVIDED TO A VICE PRESIDENT. AS PART OF THE ARRANGEMENT, THE EMPLOYEE IS EXPECTED TO HOST CERTAIN COLLEGE EVENTS AT THE RESIDENCE.

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1: TAX EXEMPT VARIABLE RATE DEMAND EDUC FACILITIES REVENUE BONDS SERIES 2006

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Board of Trustees of the institution has Empowered the Finance Committee to review and approve the Form 990 prior to filing by the institution. Additionally, copies of the FILED Form 990 are made available to all members of the Board of Trustees UPON REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The President and Vice Presidents are required to complete annual conflict of interest forms on an annual basis. All other institution staff complete the forms every other year. These forms are reviewed by management and a report is given to the Board of Trustees each fall at the semi-annual meeting.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The President's compensation is reviewed on an annual basis as part of a performance review by the Board of Trustees. Compensation is compared against information obtained from Form 990s of other institutions similar in size to Erskine.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
